title: Political Roundup: Bergdahl, Hillary Clinton And Primary Elections
teaser: NPR's Charlie Mahtesian joins us to discuss this week's hot-button political issues.
contentencoded:
The question around Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl’s release used to be about the life of one American soldier for the release of five members of the Taliban. But now, the question seems to be: what does this mean for American security?

Also, Hillary Clinton’s new book “Hard Choices” comes out tomorrow, the same day both Virginia and South Carolina head to the primary polls.

NPR’s Charlie Mahtesian joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to talk politics.

Guest

  • Charlie Mahtesian, NPR’s politics editor for digital news. He tweets @charlieNPR.
